intro: Oxypetalum laxum, commonly known as the laxum oxypetalum, is a species of flowering plant in the family Ericaceae. It is native to the high altitudes of the Andes in South America, where it thrives in cool, moist environments. Oxypetalum laxum is often cultivated for its ornamental value and is appreciated for its resilience in challenging climates.
